channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: A retired army couple looking to escape busy Bedfordshire enlist Margherita Taylor to help them spend their house-hunting budget of ?680,000 in the rural wilds of Norfolk. On their wish list are three bedrooms, some land, a potential income and seclusion. Taking a break from the properties, Margherita learns about the world's most expensive spice, saffron.
